text: On Feb. 16 from 7:30-8:30 PM ET, the ACR is hosting a town hall on #COVID19 #vaccine use in patients with rheumatic disease. The town hall will be recorded & posted to the ACR website for those unable to participate. Register & submit questions → https://t.co/tT00W3ZulS https://t.co/OHQEjjvm3d
